description.S2: which was just lost due to a dislodged navigation module.

blurb.B2: report back to Ludwig where he will tell the Stranger about a secret weapon he had stashed behind a toilet in the Spacer's Choice Cantina.

description.S1: Ludwig revealed that he's tucked away a secret weapon in Edgewater,
description.S2: to be used in the event of a mechanical uprising.
description.S3: He's decided to entrust the weapon to you to aid in the crusade.
description.S4: The weapon should be in the bathroom of Edgewater's cantina.

blurb.B1: Go to the canteen and look behind the toilet,
blurb.B2: you can pick up Ludwig's Sealed Bundle.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: You ever swung a truncheon? Let me see your rifling stance. I wanna make sure you're up to snuff.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You won't have to worry about that scout anymore.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: You beat that scout to scrap with its own legs? Pulled its optic cables out its headcase? Actually, don't tell me. Rather use my imagination.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: You are a passing fair soldier, I will confess. But you are one, and the enemy is legion. What you need is an equalizer. A weapon to strike fear in their cold, mechanical hearts.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: Cantina. Lavatory. Behind one of the toilets. That's where I've kept it hidden all these years.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You hid your secret weapon in a lavatory.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll let you know if I find it.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sharp, ain't it? The lavatory is the very last place a mechanical has need to enter.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: On the double, soldier. Don't want the bartender poking around in there with a mop.
